title: MPH: Ferrari to sack Vasseur? It's the same cycle of F1 failure
summary: Reports that Fred Vasseur is under pressure don't seem to bode well for the Ferrari F1 boss. Will the team once more take the short-term approach and ignore its tested blueprint for success, saysMark Hughes

qa_pairs.question: Who is the current team principal of Ferrari as of 2023?
What is a common criticism of Ferrari's approach to team management in Formula 1?
Which Formula 1 team is known for having a long-standing rivalry with Ferrari?
